abstract: Senators Charles E. Schumer of New York and Mike Lee of Utah proposed a measure that would allow foreigners who buy American homes to acquire visas.
snippet: Senators Charles E. Schumer of New York and Mike Lee of Utah proposed a measure that would allow foreigners who buy American homes to acquire visas.
lead_paragraph: What do you do when Americans just aren't buying houses? A new bipartisan plan in the Senate offers one idea: Import people who will.

headline.main: Senate Plan Seeks Foreigners to Spur Housing Market
